invocation.name: Dekejis' Gift I
invocation.description: Permits the priest to walk silently, giving a bonus to stealth rolls equal to one half the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Gekrish's Song I
invocation.description: A loud chant which causes an immediate fear check on anyone within range. Failure means they flee to the nearest place of safety. The Difficulty is opposed against the priest's will, with a bonus of one fifth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Vesha's Tale I
invocation.description: One victim within range will believe any reasonable lie.
